text_block_list.name: Monólogo
text_block_list.text:
Word of Super Creek's skills has<n>spread beyond the
campus, giving<n>birth to a new phrase that is now<n>
synonymous with her<n>name—"exceedingly talented."

text_block_list.name: Super Creek
text_block_list.text:
Trainer, I won first place! I know it<n>was just a scrimmage,
but I'm still<n>very happy about the results. ♪

text_block_list.name: Monólogo
text_block_list.text:
In addition to her talent, her distinctive<n>personality has also
become<n>well-known.

text_block_list.name: Super Creek
text_block_list.text:
Phew, it's hot today, isn't it? Oh...<n>you're sweating a lot,
Trainer. Let me<n>help you wipe it off.

text_block_list.name: Monólogo
text_block_list.text:
I fish around in my pockets for my<n>handkerchief, except it
isn't there.<n>Looks like I forgot it...

text_block_list.name: Super Creek
text_block_list.text: Hehe, don't worry. I'll take care of it.

text_block_list.name: Super Creek
text_block_list.text: Stay still now. There we go! ♪

text_block_list.name: Monólogo
text_block_list.text: Somehow, I always wind up getting<n>taken care of...

text_block_list.name: Super Creek
text_block_list.text:
Doesn't that feel much better now? ♪<n>Remember to check if
you've brought<n>tissues or a handkerchief with you<n>next
time before you leave, okay?

text_block_list.name: Monólogo
text_block_list.text:
Her caring nature is wonderful, but I<n>don't want her to keep
spoiling me<n>like this. I need to step up—

text_block_list.name: Skilled Trainer A
text_block_list.text:
Second place, huh... You were close.<n>What matters is that
your time is<n>getting faster, so keep it up!

text_block_list.name: Umamusume A
text_block_list.text:
Yes! It's all thanks to your guidance!<n>I'm going to work
even harder from<n>now on!

text_block_list.name: Monólogo
text_block_list.text:
...I need to step up because trainers<n>are supposed to be the
rock that<n>trainees can lean on!

text_block_list.name: Super Creek
text_block_list.text: Did you say something?

text_block_list.name: Super Creek
text_block_list.text: Really? Well then, shall we head off to<n>lunch now?

text_block_list.name: Monólogo
text_block_list.text:
But even at lunch, Super Creek<n>continues to look after me. I
rack my<n>brain to try and flip the situation<n>around.
choice_data_list: Is there anything I can do for you?
Is there anything I can do for you?

text_block_list.name: Super Creek
text_block_list.text:
Good question... Well, I'd love for you<n>to have a balanced
diet, so please eat<n>lots of veggies for me.

text_block_list.name: Super Creek
text_block_list.text:
...This is just who I am—I love helping<n>everyone. Being able
to bring a smile<n>to someone's face makes me<n>happier
than anything else.

text_block_list.name: Super Creek
text_block_list.text:
So don't worry about me. Let me<n>keep doing what I do best.
♪
choice_data_list: But don't you also want to be helped?
But don't you also want to be helped?

text_block_list.name: Super Creek
text_block_list.text:
Hmm, I don't know. When I think<n>back to my childhood, I
don't<n>remember a time when I ever felt that<n>way.

text_block_list.name: Super Creek
text_block_list.text:
As a little kid, people often remarked<n>how I never really
needed much help<n>with anything. I was very easy to<n>
handle.

text_block_list.name: Super Creek
text_block_list.text:
In fact, I remember taking care of<n>other kids my age
whenever they<n>were crying. I'd be making them feel<n>
better along with their parents.
choice_data_list: How are you always so caring and responsible?
How are you always so caring and responsible?

text_block_list.name: Super Creek
text_block_list.text: How? Hmm, that's a good question.<n>It's hard to say...

text_block_list.name: Super Creek
text_block_list.text:
Back home, watching the kids at our<n>day care grow up, I
began to realize...

text_block_list.name: Super Creek
text_block_list.text:
At first, it's hard to do anything by<n>yourself. We all need
someone's help<n>to learn how to navigate the world<n>
around us.

text_block_list.name: Super Creek
text_block_list.text:
No matter who you may be, whether<n>you're a parent,
teacher, or friend, we<n>all can benefit from a little bit of love<n>
and support.

text_block_list.name: Super Creek
text_block_list.text:
And that's why, if I can be a part of<n>someone's journey of
growth and<n>self-discovery... then isn't that just<n>
wonderful?

text_block_list.name: Monólogo
text_block_list.text:
Her desire to help people develop<n>themselves echoes the
same desire<n>that trainers have toward their racers.

text_block_list.name: Monólogo
text_block_list.text:
As a trainer, I want nothing more than<n>to help students
achieve their dreams<n>of running faster than anyone else.

text_block_list.name: Super Creek
text_block_list.text: Hehe, I'm so happy you feel the<n>same way.

text_block_list.name: Super Creek
text_block_list.text: Now I understand why you asked me<n>that question earlier.

text_block_list.name: Super Creek
text_block_list.text: Hmm, something that you can do for<n>me... Oh, I know.

text_block_list.name: Super Creek
text_block_list.text: Trainer... will you let me fix the button<n>on your shirt?

text_block_list.name: Super Creek
text_block_list.text:
It caught my eye earlier, and I<n>haven't been able to stop
thinking<n>about it.

text_block_list.name: Super Creek
text_block_list.text:
So please, give me your shirt for a<n>moment. I'll be done in a
second!
choice_data_list: I'm not doing anything for you though!

text_block_list.name: Super Creek
text_block_list.text: No, you are doing something nicefor me! This is what I want, so comehere please. ♪

text_block_list.name: Monólogo
text_block_list.text:
The day that I fully outgrow Super<n>Creek's pampering still
eludes me...
